name: I Cannot Move But I Must Fire!
name_original: I Cannot Move But I Must Fire!
description:
"I Cannot Move But I Must Fire!" is a browser game in which you must shoot to platform around the level and to destroy your enemies . Grab the key, get to the exit,annihilate your foes. All with just the left mouse button.

This game was created under 48 hours for the Game Makers' Toolkit Game Jam.
